name: Greeg Night Funkin'
description:
GREEG NIGHT FUNKIN' 

 "PRETTY DOPE ASS GAME" PLAYSTATION MAGAZINE MAY 2003 ISSUE

Uh oh! Your tryin to eat some doritos but they make you sing to eat them?

WASD IS CONTROLS

It's basically like DDR, press arrow when arrow over other arrow. And uhhh don't die.

Inspired by Friday Night Funkin' By NinjaMuffin99

Characters Made By NoobGyver On Youtube

Music Is From Friday Night Funkin'
